Title: Why Do Conservatives Hate Feminism?
Description:

Title: Unions Will Save America.
Description:
Use code LEEJA50 to get 50% off your first Factor box at https://bit.ly/3lJJNlZ! | Unions will save America. Or at least they might. Let's talk about the WGA SAG-AFTRA strike against the AMPTP, the history of union organizing, the history of union busting, and the current growing labor movement in America. Could it be the answer to all our problems??

More info about the PRO Act ➡️ https://democrats-edworkforce.house.gov/imo/media/doc/richard_l_trumka_protecting_the_right_to_organize_act_hr20factsheet1.pdf 

Find the address, phone number, and email for your Congresspeople ➡️ https://www.congress.gov/members/find-your-membe r

Here's a script for when you call them:
"Hi! My name is ________ and I live in _____________. I am a constituent of [insert your Congressperson's name] and I am calling to discuss the Protecting the Right to Organize or PRO Act. That's H.R. 20/S.567. I want to indicate my strong support for the passage of this bill and for an increase in labor organizing protection, and I would like to know their stance on the issue.
[insert back and forth about your Congressperson's stance]
Once again I am strongly in favor of the PRO Act and I urge [insert your Congressperson's name] to vote to pass the act. Thank you."

Title: The US Is Ugly. THIS is Why.
Description:

Title: Why the US is Still Segregated
Description:
Try 5 pairs of glasses at home for free at http://warbyparker.com/leeja ! | Every single city in the United States is still largely segregated by race. But this isn't just because of coincidence or personal preference. It is because of a systematic, government-sanctioned process over the course of the 20th century that forced Black Americans into low quality, over-crowded housing, and barred them from receiving financing or assistance to buy the few homes that were available to them. We can still see the effects of this state-sanctioned segregation to this day. Let's learn about this in the context of the important Supreme Court decision Shelley v. Kraemer.

Sources and more available on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/leejamiller

Title: What happens when murder is an accident?

Title: Let's talk about Critical Race Theory since College Board won't.
Description:
Download the FREE Upside App at https://upside.app.link/leeja to get an extra 25 cents back for every gallon on your first tank of gas. | College Board has changed its AP African American Studies framework, and the topics it removed are surprisingly similar to the objections Ron DeSantis, Florida, and others on the far right have to critical race theory, intersectionality, reparations, and more.

The AP African American Studies Course Framework: https://apcentral.collegeboard.org/media/pdf/ap-african-american-studies-course-framework.pdf

Title: The Truth About Adidas' Nazi Roots
Description:
Take back your financial freedom today by visiting http://PDSDebt.com/miller ! Adidas dropped Kanye West and their Yeezy line 19 days after he made pointed antisemitic tweets and laughed about how they would never drop him. This led to #boycottadidas trending on twitter, calls for them to drop the artist, and a resurgence of discussion around the fact that Adidas was founded by literal Nazis. So what's the background on this, is it true, and what larger implications does this discussion have for how we view corporations and their supposed ethics?

Title: When Drag Was A Crime
Description:
To find a sense of peace and improve your sleep, get started with Aura today for free. The first 500 people to use my link will also get an exclusive 25% off + a free trial to the Aura membership: https://www.aurahealth.io/leejamiller . HAPPY PRIDE! Today we're talking all about the criminalization of drag and crossdressing. What were the laws like that outlawed drag? Who was allowed to perform drag and who was penalized? What does race have to do with it????
THANK YOU to MondayNightBallroom for the idea for today's video!!

SOURCES:

Clare Sears, Arresting Dress: Cross-Dressing, Law, and Fascination in Nineteenth-Century San Francisco, https://bookshop.org/a/83711/9780822357582

Mallory Drover, Fashion Crimes: The Rabbit Hole of Criminalized Cross-Dressing in US History, https://co-op.antiochcollege.edu/fashion-crimes-the-rabbit-hole-of-criminalized-cross-dressing-in-us-history/

A Gender Variance Who’s Who - Lee Brewster, https://zagria.blogspot.com/2009/10/lee-brewster-1943-2000-retailer-activist.html

People v. Archibald, https://casetext.com/case/people-v-archibald-6/

Hugh Ryan, How Dressing in Drag Was Labeled a Crime in the 20th Century, https://www.history.com/news/stonewall-riots-lgbtq-drag-three-article-rule

Drag in the Windy City, http://digitalchicagohistory.org/exhibits/show/drag/crime-and-culture

Liam Knox, Missouri lawmaker proposes bill criminalizing public libraries’ drag queen story hours, https://www.nbcnews.com/feature/nbc-out/missouri-lawmaker-proposes-bill-criminalizing-public-libraries-drag-queen-story-n1118236

Title: Assassination and Murder: The Surprising History of the Insanity Defense
Description:
The first 1,000 people to use my code LEEJAMILLER0522 or use this link to sign up will get a 1 month free trial of Skillshare: https://skl.sh/leejamiller06221 ! Criminal insanity and exceptions for mental illness have been part of legal systems since the Greek and Roman times, but not all legal systems have adopted it. Trials in Salem Massachusetts blamed mental illness on the devil. It wasn't until the M'Naughten test was created in the 1800s that US and English law had a recognized insanity defense. Let's dive in!

Title: Kidnapped Heiress Turned Radical Anarchist: The Stockholm Syndrome Defense | Patty Hearst Trial
Description:
Use code LEEJA120 to get $120 off Factor at https://bit.ly/3kZhIU8 ! Patty Hearst, the granddaughter of media mogul William Randolph Hearst, was kidnapped from her home in 1974 by the SLA, a radical anarchist group set on wreaking violence and havoc and overthrowing capitalism. At first a victim, Patty eventually joined the fight with her captors, committing felonies along the way. When she was finally caught and brought to trial, Patty claimed she had been brainwashed and experienced Stockholm Syndrome. Does it hold up in court? Let's discuss!

Title: Depp v. Heard: How Media Frenzies Shape Trials
Description:
Try 5 pairs of Warby Parker glasses at home for free at https://www.warbyparker.com/LEEJA .* Let's talk about the history of media interference with trials and due process! From Aaron Burr in 1807 to the Lindbergh Baby Case in 1935 to the murder of Marilyn Sheppard and trial of her husband Sam Sheppard in 1966--The Media has played a pivotal role in the outcome of some high profile cases--let's talk about how that interference can erode due process and how that applies to the case between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard.

*Home Try-On Kits are US only. No international shipping.

Title: Why Medieval People Put Pigs on Trial for Murder
Description:
Medieval times were wild, y'all. Roosters were tried for witchcraft and burnt at the stake. In France they put pigs on trial for murder. Like, REGULARLY. Bees and insects were banished and put to death. Let's talk all about kooky animal law by looking at medieval animal trials.

Inspired by: Katy Barnett & Jeremy Gans, Guilty Pigs: The Weird and Wonderful History of Animal Law (2022), https://amzn.to/370MbOf

Cockatrice art by Brynn Metheney, https://linktr.ee/brynnmetheney

Title: CARDI B WINS legal battle against Tasha K, but THERE'S MORE?
Description:
Thank you to Curiosity Stream for partnering with me on today's video! Use the link https://curiositystream.com/LeejaMiller with code LEEJAMILLER to get a full year for $14.99! Cardi B was victorious in her defamation lawsuit against Tasha K last week, winning a $4 million verdict. But that's just the tip of the iceberg when it comes to Cardi B's legal woes!

Even though Cardi B has closed the book on the Tasha K legal trouble (thought Tasha K says she'll appeal), she also has a lawsuit related to a tattoo on an album cover going to trial soon, as well as ongoing criminal charges, and numerous people suing her to try to get a piece of her ever growing pie. LET'S TRY TO BREAK THIS DOWN!

Title: Judge Determines Pablo Escobar’s Hippos are "People"
Description:
So Pablo let 4 hippos loose in 1993 and now there's 120 and they're considered an invasive species. Animal rights activists are pushing to save them from Colombian authorities. A judge in the US District Court for the Southern District of Ohio ruled that they are "interested persons" in the ongoing litigation in Colombia. Hippo law! Who knew!
#pabloescobar #pabloescobarhippos

Title: Real Lawyer Reacts to Natalia Taylor MCKAMEY MANOR VIDEOS -- Is the waiver even legal??
Description:
McKamey Manor located an hour south of Nashville in Tennessee touts itself as being the best survivor horror haunted house in the world and it has been reported that the waiting list to get into this exclusive horror experience has grown to over 24,000 people. However, this “haunted house” includes actual physical and psychological torture and requires all guests to sign at 40-page waiver that includes a notice that death may result from participating in the experience. Is this even legal??? I wanted to learn more about this horror show so I figured I’d watch a couple of Natalia’s (@NataliaTaylor) videos which seem to be the most popular, and we’ll see the inside story and dissect the 40-page waiver to see if it would actually hold up in court.

DON'T FORGET TO CHECK OUT MY BRAND NEW CONSULTING SERVICES: https://www.leejamiller.com/

Natalia Video 1: https://youtu.be/FhVfJPmyOkE
Natalia Video 2: https://youtu.be/k-UozNJGtPc 

THE (old) WAIVER: https://docs.google.com/viewerng/viewer?url=https://abovethelaw.com/uploads/2019/10/MM-Waiver-and-Nondisclosure-Agreement.docx.pdf&hl=en_US 

Comparison Waivers: 
Waterpark: https://www.americandream.com/waiver  
Snow tubing: https://www.threeriversparks.org/sites/default/files/pdfs/activities/Tubing_waiver_2018.pdf

Title: Disney settles with ScarJo and sues over Marvel copyrights
Description:
Disney just settled with Scarlett Johansson for a reported $40 million over the streaming release of Black Widow while they're also in the midst of suing the descendants and families of comic book writers like Steve Ditko over copyrights related to famous Marvel characters (including Black Widow as well as Spider Man and many others). I'm an intellectual property attorney so let's see if we can untangle this legal web!

SOURCES
ORIGINAL SCARJO COMPLAINT: https://deadline.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/Complaint_Black-Widow-1-WM.pdf

Brooks Barnes, “Disney Sues to Keep Complete Rights to Marvel Characters,” New York Times (Sept. 24, 2021) https://www.nytimes.com/2021/09/24/business/media/disney-marvel-copyright-lawsuits.html  

“Navigating US Copyright Termination Rights,” WIPO, https://www.wipo.int/wipo_magazine/en/2012/04/article_0005.html#2 

17 USC 203, https://www.copyright.gov/title17/92chap2.html#203 

“Works Made for Hire,” US Copyright Office, https://www.copyright.gov/circs/circ09.pdf 

RELATED VIDEOS:

Title: Top 10 Back to School MUST HAVES (From a Lawyer!) *these will help you survive*
Description:
Here are my top 10 MUST HAVES for anyone in school (whether it's law school, grad school, or undergrad). Do yourself a favor and grab some of these to make your life a little easier this school year. These are the 10 items every lawstudent needs to survive.

1. Book stand: https://amzn.to/3Afe5Pw
2. Verilux light: https://amzn.to/3CbImk6
3. Pens and highlighters: https://amzn.to/3rTIqjV (Bic soft feel); https://amzn.to/3luRhr3 (highlighters w/ a see-through tip so you can see where you’re marking)

Title: WHAT TO DO WHEN YOUR GOVERNMENT STOPS WORKING
Description:
As I'm posting this I'm realizing it might be a bit naively optimistic about what you can actually do at this point in late stage capitalism... But if you're just grasping for something, ANYTHING, tangible that you can do to try to feel a sense of efficacy in your community and in your government after the attempted coup / insurrection at the capital last week, I have a couple tips. Most importantly tho we're all in this together.

Title: THIS LAW AFFECTS YOU EVERY DAY BUT YOU'VE PROBABLY NEVER HEARD OF IT *the TRUTH*
Description:
What involves the Wolf of Wall Street Jordan Belfort, the creation of The World Wide Web, fraud, revenge p*rn, sex worker rights, and MOMS??? It's called CDA 230 (Communications Decency Act Section 230) and you've probably never heard of it. Let's dive into this 25 year-old law and how it affects your everyday life, including recent attempts to change the law through FOSTA / SESTA and the EARN IT Act. Won't you join me???

SOURCES:
If you want to learn more about CDA 230 I highly recommend The 26 Words That Created the Internet by Jeff Kosseff: https://amzn.to/2KxkGAn
Carrie Goldberg has a great book called Nobody's Victim: Fighting Psychos, Stalkers, Pervs, and Trolls: https://amzn.to/2LCjnk6

Title: Can ENBY be Trademarked? | Lawyer Explains

A company called Wild Flower is trying to own the exclusive rights to use the term "enby" as a trademark for s*x toys, and they're suing a black trans owned shop called Enby over those rights. Let's unpack the ethical dilemma that is trademark laws, owning rights to language and to words, and exactly what's happening with this lawsuit.

Title: True Story Behind the Ted Bundy Trials | Lawyer GRWM
Description:
GRWM while I explain the legal side of Ted Bundy's story and the trials that led to his eventual execution. It's a tale of extreme egotism to the point of being fatal, won't you join me?? We'll cover the murders of Caryn Campbell and Kimberly Leach and the abduction and assault of Carol DaRonch, then I'll explain how Ted Bundy was tried, the difficulties with his court case, and how he sabotaged his own chances because he thought he could do law after completing less than a third of law school.

Title: Lawyer Reacts to the Trial of the Chicago 7 (movie)
Description:
How accurate is Aaron Sorkin's new legal drama The Trial of the Chicago 7?? Let's find out! The movie follows the trial of 8 men who were charged with inciting the riots that rocked Chicago during the 1968 Democratic National Convention. I react to the movie but also give the background to the trial during what turns out to be an era of civil unrest that is eerily similar to what we've experienced in 2020. COME ALONG FOR THE RIDE!

Title: Real Lawyer Explains RBG's Legacy and What We Can Do to Move Forward
Description:
Ruth Bader Ginsburg died on Friday at the age of 87 after serving on the US Supreme Court for 27 years. Let's talk about how RBG changed the legal landscape, the criticisms that have been lodged against her, and the tangible action items and things we can do to protect her legacy, grow from her mistakes, move forward and never lose hope. Please join me in honoring this titan of a woman.

Title: Can Trump Ban TikTok?? | Real Lawyer Explains
Description:
Hi I'm a real life lawyer and today I'd like to explore whether it's true that Trump can actually ban TikTok??? Short answer: probably. He is claiming authority under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act which has granted outsized authority to presidents so they can control private foreign assets with very little congressional oversight. Join me on a journey through the decades as I examine this longstanding precedent and whether Trump could use it to ban our beloved TikTok for good.
